item.name: FIND core BSCS services by msisdn

exec: var refDataFiltered = _.filter(refData, function(e) { return e.productSpecification && (e.productSpecification.id == 'serviceBSCS' || e.productSpecification.id == 'faf' ) && e.productOffering.category =='option'});
